Diagnosis. This species is characterized by the gnathos with two short lateral lobes arising from the middle of the lateral arms, a sclerotized median plate truncated on the outer margin and with a triangular process ventrolaterally, and sacculus with only one curved, spine-shaped dorsal process ( Fig. 33 ). It similar to
L. serrata
sp. nov.
in the male genitalia, and the difference between them are stated in the diagnosis of the latter species.
Distribution. China ( Hainan , Hebei , Tianjin , Yunnan ).
